item.title: Version 5.5.1
item.description:
Focusmo 5.5.1

What’s New

  • Hide timer display in all timer modes : Hide the timer display to save space, reduce visual clutter. Timer is visible on hover.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed: Task switching not working using “Start selected text as task” shortcut or quick access panel.
  • 1 min warning not showing in pomodoro mode.
  • Opening multiple windows on timer end screen.
